channel.title: RS-Reborn - Doin' It Right
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.rs-reborn.org/img/title2/rsrlogo1.gif[/img]
[B]Introduction[/B]
Below, you can read our Behind the Scenes May, which includes everything you need to know RS-Reborn (from our goals, plans, etc...).
[SPOILER=BTS May: Welcome - About RS-Reborn] [img]http://puu.sh/8Dm0n.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
We fully understand that there have been many, many remakes of the 2005-2007 era. Despite of that, we're very dedicated to get this project done, and do it right, hint out slogan "Doin' It Right".
Since we're aiming this to be a FULL remake of the game, we encourage anyone who can to help out with providing us data and information on things we may need. This includes some of the following (just a general idea):
[ul][li]Skill data[/li] [li]Formula(s)[/li] [li]Spawn locations (for NPC)[/li] [li]Dialogue[/li] [li]Images (for the website, if you find any that we're missing or might need)[/li] [li]Cache & Client (if you have a cache/client that you feel we may need, feel free to send it to us)[/li] [li]Development tools[/li][/ul]
[B]Game[/B]
[SPOILER=Update List] The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.
[img]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/worldmap.gif[/img] [b]World[/b]
[ul][li]All ways of travelling[/li] [li]Global item drops[/li] [li]Pathfinding for walking[/li] [li]Complete clipping map (walls and tiles) - Supports clipping variation[/li] [li]Party rooms[/li] [li]Doors[/li] [li]Searching (hay bales, cupboard, drawers, etc)[/li] [li]Npc spawns[/li] [li]Slayer Monsters[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li]PvP fully complete[/li] [li]PvN fully complete[/li] [li]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)[/li] [li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li]Every weapon special attack[/li] [li]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li] [li]Degradable equipment[/li] [li]Weapon poisoning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]Every modern combat spell[/li] [li]Every ancient combat spell[/li] [li]Can't mage through walls[/li] [li]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/li] [li]Charge w/ godspells[/li] [li]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/li] [li]Weakening spells[/li] [li]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/li] [li]Every other spell including:[/li] [list][li]B2b/B2p[/li] [li]Charging orbs[/li] [li]Alching/Superheat[/li] [li]Enchanting jewelry[/li][/list][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li]Bows/arrows[/li] [li]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/li] [li]Crossbows (the regular one and karil's)[/li] [li]Can't shoot through walls[/li] [li]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li]All bones bury-able[/li] [li]Every prayer working properly[/li] [li]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)[/li] [li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]All bars can be made[/li] [li]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li]Ring of forging[/li] [li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li]All fish can be caught[/li] [li]Big net fishing[/li] [li]Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan)[/li] [li]Correct item requirements[/li] [li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Moving fishing locations[/li] [li]Fishing Platform[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li]Meats[/li] [li]Flour collecting[/li] [li]Bread[/li] [li]Pies[/li] [li]Stews[/li] [li]Pizzas[/li] [li]Cakes[/li] [li]Wine[/li] [li]Hot drinks[/li] [li]Potatoes[/li] [li]Diary[/li] [li]Brew making[/li] [li]Cooking gauntlets[/li] [li]Eating food (in pieces)[/li] [li]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li] [li]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li]All trees cut-able[/li] [li]Correct fell chance algorithms[/li] [li]Birds nest falling out[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li]All logs light able[/li] [li]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li]Firelighters[/li] [li]Pyre log firemaking[/li] [li]mort'ton temple(making sacred oil)[/li] [li]Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses)[/li] [li]All lighting sources[/li] [li]Colored fires[/li] [li]"Backward" firelighting[/li] [li]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
[ul][li]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable[/li] [li]Run energy affected(weight + level)[/li] [li]Force movement mask[/li] [li]Correct animations used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4jFcc.gif[/img] [b]Herblore[/b]
[ul][li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Herb Identifying[/li] [li]All potions can be made[/li] [li]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/li] [li]Coconut making[/li] [li]Item grinding(pestle use)[/li] [li]Poisoning weapons(all types)[/li] [li]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b]Thieving[/b]
[ul][li]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula[/li] [li]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards[/li] [li]Doors lockpicking and chests[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]Cutting gems[/li] [li]Making amulets, necklaces, and rings[/li] [li]Stringing amulets and necklaces[/li] [li]Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide[/li] [li]Crafting normal, hard, snakeskin, and dragon hide[/li] [li]Crafting snakeskin[/li] [li]Spinning wool and flax[/li] [li]Making pottery[/li] [li]Attaching studs[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]Use of the Abyss[/li] [list][li]Rock mining[/li] [li]Tendrils chopping[/li] [li]Boil burning[/li] [li]Eyes distracting[/li] [li]Gap crossing[/li] [li]Passage[/li] [li]Skulled when entering[/li] [li]Prayer drained to 0[/li] [li]Dark mage repairing pouches[/li][/list] [li]All altars working[/li] [li]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li]Use of Pouches included[/li] [li]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li]Tiaras enchanting[/li] [li]Combining runes and their uses[/li] [list][li]Mist runes[/li] [li]Dust runes[/li] [li]Mud runes[/li] [li]Smoke runes[/li] [li]Steam runes[/li] [li]Lava runes[/li] [li]Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges)[/li][/list][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
[ul][li]All logs can be fletched[/li] [li]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/li] [li]Can string bows[/li] [li]Can make bolt-tips[/li] [li]Darts[/li] [li]Brutal arrows making[/li] [li]Bow stringing[/li] [li]Can make arrows[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [b]Slayer[/b]
[ul][li]All slayer masters[/li] [li]Every monsters added for every tasks[/li] [li]Burthorpe tasks[/li] [li]Canifis tasks[/li] [li]Edgeville tasks[/li] [li]Lost city tasks[/li] [li]Shilo village tasks[/li] [li]Tips on killing monsters[/li] [li]'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay[/li] [li]Slayer shops[/li] [li]All slayer masters working[/li] [li]Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task[/li] [li]All equipment working[/li] [list][li]Item that finishes off some monsters[/li] [li]Equipment that are required to fight some monsters[/li][/list] [li]Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre)[/li] [li]Slayer gem working[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
[ul][li]Allotments[/li] [list][li]All vegetables working[/li] [li]Correct crop timings[/li][/list] [li]Flowers[/li] [list][li]All flowers and their effects working[/li] [li]Correct flower timings[/li][/list] [li]Herbs[/li] [list][li]All herbs working[/li] [li]Correct herbs timings[/li][/list] [li]Hops[/li] [list][li]All hops working[/li] [li]Correct hops timings[/li][/list] [li]Fruit Trees[/li] [list][li]All fruit trees working[/li] [li]Correct sapling growth timings[/li] [li]Correct fruit tree growth timings[/li][/list] [li]Trees[/li] [list][li]All trees working[/li] [li]Correct sapling growth timings[/li] [li]Correct tree growth timings[/li][/list] [li]Gardeners[/li] [list][li]Watch over crops working[/li] [li]Correct payments per type of crop[/li][/list] [li]Compost Bin[/li] [list][li]Supercompost making[/li] [li]Compost making[/li][/list] [li]Bushes[/li] [list][li]berries regrowing after being picked[/li] [list][li]Correct bush timings[/li] [li]All bushes working[/li][/list] [li]Tool Leprechaun[/li] [list][li]Store items working[/li] [li]Swaps noted items[/li][/list] [li]All farming patches working[/li] [li]Correct disease chance algorithm[/li] [li]Special plants[/li] [li]Spirit trees teleport to tree gnome[/li] [list][li]Calquat trees[/li] [li]Belladona trees[/li] [li]Cactus trees[/li][/list] [li]All tools working[/li] [list][li]Magic secateurs[/li][/list][/list][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b]
[ul][li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li] [li]Fight Caves[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Fishing Trawler[/li] [li]Gnome Ball[/li] [li]Bar crawl[/li] [li]Blast Furnace[/li] [li]Champion's Challenge[/li] [li]Chompy hunting[/li] [li]Games room[/li] [li]Jungle Clean Up[/li] [li]Rogue Trader[/li] [li]Rogue's Den[/li] [li]Splitbark Armour[/li] [li]Temple Trekking[/li] [li]Magic Training Arena[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music/Sounds[/b]
[ul][li]All areas have music (f2p done)[/li] [li]All sounds added[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li]Quest will come later into development...[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [b]Random Events[/b]
[ul][li]Genie[/li] [li]Drunken dwarf[/li] [li]Explosive mining rocks[/li] [li]Flying pickaxe heads[/li] [li]Flying axe heads[/li] [li]Whirlpool fishing[/li] [li]Big fish stealing equipment[/li] [li]Evil chicken[/li] [li]Freaky Forester[/li] [li]River troll[/li] [li]Rock golem[/li] [li]Shade[/li] [li]Spirit tree[/li] [li]Zombie[/li] [li]More to come...[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [b]Miscellaneous[/b]
[ul][li]Multiple worlds support[/li] [li]Ground items (items wait for 60 seconds before becoming public, then disappear after an additional 150 seconds. Untradable items disappear after 180 seconds from being dropped)[/li] [li]Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)[/li] [li]Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)[/li] [li]Skill interfaces[/li] [li]Repairing broken/degraded items[/li] [li]Item weight[/li] [li]Treasure trails[/li] [list][li]Clue scroll system[/li] [li]Kill some monster to get the key for a chest/drawers (level3 clues)[/li] [li]Puzzles[/li] [li]Simple Clues[/li] [li]Puzzle : hover your mouse on the hint icon to get a hint[/li] [li]Anagram Scrolls[/li] [li]Challenge Scrolls[/li] [li]Cryptics[/li] [li]Coordinate(need sextant, chart, and watch to dig)[/li] [li]Speak to clues[/li] [li]key to open drawers and chests[/li] [li]saradomin/zamorak fight on level 3 clues[/li] [li]Digging clues[/li] [li]Map Scrolls[/li] [li]Search Scrolls[/li] [li]Mage book making(torn pages)[/li] [li]Every clue level reward(25+ rewards)[/li] [li]Npcs dropping clue scrolls[/li][/list][/ul]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/awtt5/b9a27d203d.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/awuKG/36d73a9b2d.jpg[/img]

item.title: RS-Reborn - Doin' It Right
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Draconian, post:79, topic:542900”]Looks fudgeing nice! but just a question,what reviosion are you using now?317,377,464 because I got lost
because of all the changes :P,and can you pm me the domain?

And are there member worlds and f2p worlds?Because if there is I would defenitly donate for this server![/quote]

  1. There will be both members and free worlds, but for now there will only be a free world since we’re working on free-to-play content first.

I’ve sent you the domain.

Read full topic

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:64, topic:542900”][quote author=Scully link=topic=661777.msg4460398#msg4460398 date=1417290476]
Filled out the “Action Sender” to match most of the packets that were in my open source 377, and started adding handlers for incomming packets as well.

Not sure if it was mentioned here, but before I joined the team switched over to a 377, so I’m helping out and whatnot.


[/quote]

Hi Brian, how have you been[/quote]

I’ve been mostly alive, which is good since I’m in the business of living.
